summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBanish pimples with Bubble‚Äôs Blemish Begone Acne Prevention Kit. This 4-step routine targets breakouts without being harsh on acne-prone skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeveloped with dermatologistsSuper Clear helps reduce redness from breakoutsSuper Clear helps prevent future breakoutsKnock Out helps clear blemishesLevel Up provides ultra-lightweight hydrationGentle enough for daily useKey IngredientsSalicylic Acid helps clear pores and remove acne-causing nastiesWintergreen Extract helps purify skin and reduce excess sebumAloe Leaf Juice helps soothe and moisturizeOatmeal Extract helps calm skinNiacinamide helps hydrate, calm irritation, and support skin barrier functionIncludesFresh Start Gel Cleanser (1.7 oz)Super Clear Acne Treating Serum 2% Salicylic Acid (1.0 oz)Knock Out Acne Spot Treatment 1.8% Salicylic Acid (0.33 oz)Level Up Balancing Gel Moisturizer (1.7 oz)Item 2634734How To UseBegin by applying 1-2 pumps of Fresh Start to damp skin. Gently massage into a lather, rinse with water, and pat dry. Follow by applying one pump of Super Clear to clean, dry skin and allow to absorb for 1 minute. Next, apply a small amount of Knock Out directly to blemishes and let dry for 2 minutes. Knock Out can be applied up to 1-3 times daily until blemish has cleared, and as tolerated. Finish by evenly applying Level Up and top it all off with an SPF for daytime.Precautions: Only use as directed.IngredientsFresh Start: Water (Aqua), Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Acrylates/Steareth-20 Methacrylate Copolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ascorbic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Caffeine, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Hydrolyzed Rhodophyceae Extract, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Sulfite.Super Clear: Active - Salicylic Acid -- 2%Inactive: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Squalane, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Sodium Polyacyloyldimethyl Taurate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Colloidal Oatmeal, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Xanthan Gum, Coco-Glucoside, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol.Knock Out: Active Ingredients - Salicylic Acid -- 1.8% Inactive Ingredients- Water (Aqua), Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate,Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Azelaic Acid, Salix Nigra (Willlow) Bark Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Zinc PCA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Juice, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol.Level Up: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucose, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Niacinamide, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Oleyl Erucate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Succinate, Squalane, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Zinc PCA, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Begin by applying 1-2 pumps of Fresh Start to damp skin. Gently massage into a lather, rinse with water, and pat dry. Follow by applying one pump of Super Clear to clean, dry skin and allow to absorb for 1 minute. Next, apply a small amount of Knock Out directly to blemishes and let dry for 2 minutes. Knock Out can be applied up to 1-3 times daily until blemish has cleared, and as tolerated. Finish by evenly applying Level Up and top it all off with an SPF for daytime.Precautions: Only use as directed.
ingredients: Sodium Sulfite.Super Clear: Active - Salicylic Acid -- 2%Inactive: Water (Aqua)
Phenoxyethanol.Knock Out: Active Ingredients - Salicylic Acid -- 1.8% Inactive Ingredients- Water (Aqua)

reviews.headline: Bangers
reviews.comments: The acne serum is by far the best everyday gentle acne treatment ive used i notice a difference literally the morning after expecially if i have a big one the knock out treatment eats it up! great cleanser and the good moisturizer for oily skin and non comedogenic

reviews.headline: My go to skincare routine!!
reviews.comments: This has kit has made it so easy for me to stick to a skincare routine. I love every product in this kit. I have oily, sensitive skin, and acne. This kit gives you all of the products you need for the perfect oily skin/acne routine. I'm surprised that the moisturizer doesn't make my skin feel more oily. My skin feels softer and I have noticed my acne get better. The spot treatment is my favorite part. It helps get rid of acne so much faster. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: i love it!!
reviews.comments: i love this product!! it has everything you need for skincare. it has helped clear up my skin so much!! my favorite part is the pen which you can use to spot treat an area. it's so helpful!!

reviews.headline: LOVE these products
reviews.comments: I love all of these products. Bubble gifted this to me and I am so happy they did. I got a chance to try so many new products in just one box. The knock out stick has helped so much in just a few days! I definitely recommend this to anyone struggling with acne. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: Love this so much!
reviews.comments: I reviewed this products from bubble and tried it. Honestly bubble never misses with there products. Although it's for oily skin people it worked great for my dry skin to help me prevent further blemishes on my skin.  #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: I'm in love with this Kit!
reviews.comments: Bubble gifted me this kit and I'm telling you that it's so good I'm inlove with it. I would recommend this to anyone who has blemishes it's light weight, easy to use and it's also travel friendly you should get it I think it's totally worth it! #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: Effective and affordable.
reviews.comments: The Blemish Begone Acne Prevention Kit by Bubble is an excellent option for acne-prone skin no matter your age. The Fresh Start Gel Cleanser gently cleanses without stripping, while the Super Clear Blemish Serum with 2% Salicylic Acid targets breakouts without irritation. The Knock Out Acne Spot Treatment offers precise, fast-acting spot treatment, and the Level Up Moisturizer is lightweight while offering balanced hydration. I appreciate how effective and affordable this skincare line is. This product set was gifted to me by Bubble. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: I love the variety
reviews.comments: #bubblegifted I like that this kit includes a full skincare routine. My favorite product for this set is the spot treatment. It has a very presice applicator and is easy to apply. This set works better for normal to oily skin since the moisturizeris lightweight.

reviews.headline: A need!!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love the blemish be gone!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This was a kit that I used to treat my acne, as well overall treat my skin. As someone with sensitive skin, I loved it, there was no irritation and saw differences on my skin. Super Clear did give a slight sting but as I kept using it, it went away. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: It really helped my skin
reviews.comments: I like that I got this kit to use to help with my acne breakouts. I love that it's great for oily skin. My favorite product is the acne spot treatment. I put it on and I forget that it's even there and without thinking about it my acne spots disappear. I love this kit

reviews.headline: Would continue using this again and again.
reviews.comments: I'm in love with this acne prevention kit. All of these products used together give me phenomenal skin and reduces my acne in size, overnight as well. I love the acne gel the most and very easy to carry with and use whenever. I see myself using this very often. Gifted by Bubble.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: these products are genuinely amazing and perfect for oily and acne prone skin types. the spot treatment is an absolute game changer, and gets rid of pimples for me instantly!

reviews.headline: Your sign to purchase BLEMISH BE GONE KIT
reviews.comments: This is everything you need in one box. The acne spot treatment is perfect for the go.

reviews.headline: Prevents acne
reviews.comments: I love how this kit comes with everything you need to target your acne. It is a great value and perfect for your 4 step skincare routine. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: "Achieve Clear Skin Fast with the Bubble Blemish Be Gone Kit
reviews.comments: I recently tried the Bubble Blemish Be Gone Kit and was really impressed. The kit includes a cleanser, toner, and spot treatment. The cleanser is gentle yet effective, leaving my skin feeling clean without drying it out. The toner helps balance my skin and tighten pores. The spot treatment works wonders overnight, reducing redness and swelling quickly. Overall, it's easy to use and has noticeably improved my skin's clarity. I highly recommend it for anyone dealing with blemishes!

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: This kit has helped me with so many breakouts and has cleared my skin! I love it!

reviews.headline: Great starter set!
reviews.comments: #bubblegifted I love bubble products like slam dunk, and this is a really great set! I was excited to try the knock out treatment. I struggle with hormonal breakouts during my cycle and the serum and treatment really help. Highly recommend you give it a try!

reviews.headline: Truly a great find if you struggle with acne
reviews.comments: All of these products have helped my skin immensely during a breakout. I especially love the acne spot treatment, it makes my blemishes go away overnight!!

media.headline: I'm in love with this Kit!
media.caption: Blemish be gone!

media.headline: Your sign to purchase BLEMISH BE GONE KIT

faceoff_positive.comments: I must say that this is a one of a kind kit that I love. It contains one of my favorite cleansers which is the Fresh Start Gel Cleanser which leaves my face squeaky clean and refreshed after use. The acne treating serum works great in targeting my acne spots and I have seen improvements in them fading away since I started using this product. Not to mention the knock out acne spot treatment I use both products together and they have been doing wonders for my acne prone skin and I also use them consistently both day and nights. The Level Up Gel Moisturizer compliments this routine as it helps to give my skin a smooth and hydrating finishing touch. Honestly I'm happy I was introduced to this set by Bubble because I now have products that has proven to help my skin concerns. Bubblegifted
faceoff_positive.headline: The Best Acne Kit

faceoff_negative.comments: Amazing products but would not recommend for sensitive skin for some reason it really irritates my face and makes it red in which causes me to break out
faceoff_negative.headline: Amazing but not for me
